text: On obratil Svoye proshchen'ye k tem troim, Kto byl ostavlen (v dome s tvoyego soglas'ya), I tesnoy sdelalas' dlya nikh zemlya So vsey svoyey (beskrayney) shir'yu, I sdelalos' ikh dusham tesno, I stalo yasno im togda, Chto ot Allakha im ubezhishcha (iskat') Lish' v Yego sobstvennom (udele). Togda On obratilsya k nim s proshchen'yem, Chtob s pokayaniyem oni k Nemu prishli, - Allakh, poistine, blagopreklonen, miloserd
